prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a royal appearance with a crown and bright colors.
Show me a water-type Pokemon that looks wise and has a playful personality.
Imagine a unique Pokemon with a pink body and a distinctive hat, perfect for a magical forest.
Generate a Pokemon with a funny expression and a vibrant outfit that stands out in battles.
Design a Slowking-inspired character that exhibits both intelligence and silliness in its design.
Give me a Pokemon that combines elements of royalty and silliness, featuring shades of pink and green.
Make a charming Pokemon that loves to relax by the water and has an eye-catching color palette.
